Package core

Interface UpdateListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BufferOccupancyReport, ContactsDuringAnICTReport, EncountersVSUniqueEncountersReport, EnergyLevelReport, JumpSizeDistributionReport, LocationSnapshotReport, MessageAvailabilityReport, MessageCopyCountReport, MessageLocationReport, NodeDensityReport, RadiusOfGyrationReport, SamplingReport, SnapshotReport, TotalContactTimeReport, TotalEncountersReport, UniqueEncountersReport
public interface UpdateListener
Interface for classes that want to be informed about every single update call to the World object.
NOTE: if update interval is large (if, e.g., no movement or connection simulation is needed), update listeners may not get called at all during the simulation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    updated(List<DTNHost> hosts)
    Method is called on every update cycle.
